name: Blow the Hen Down
description:
Arrg these damn hens, they do nothing but multiply!

Of course, it was a bad idea to load them on board.

Ahoy Jim Lad, ye get rid of them before they make us running out of space and make us feed the fishes!

Controls:
WASD - move around
Mouse - rotate the view
Left Mouse Button - Pick up and throw objects

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 42: "Running Out of Space"
